write_up: Before he lost his ability to control how people thought of him, Chance the Rapper had his reputation for a reason. His music is silly and earnest, but it has an unmistakably youthful driving energy. Ab-Soul delivers his feature, understanding the task well. The production is also endearingly buoyant.
lyric: She only got you as a n**** on the side / That’s a n**** on the side of a side bitch, homie
